CustomField.description: Total_Confirmed_Scheduled_Session_Hours__c can be used, because in CourseAPI we're displaying only final courses. Course can be final, only if all sessions except Reunion are confirmed.
CustomField.formula:
"This course consists of " & TEXT(Count_of_Confirmed_Sessions__c) & " session(s) totalling " & TEXT(Total_Confirmed_Scheduled_Session_Hours__c) & " hours." &
IF(Total_Virtual_Support_Hours__c <= 0, "", BR() & "You will also receive at least " & TEXT(Total_Virtual_Support_Hours__c) & " hours of enhanced personalised support from your course leader delivered via a closed messaging group. ") &
IF(Count_of_Unconfirmed_Reunion_Sessions__c > 0, BR() & $Label.Confirmation_Notification_Course_Reunion, "")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is used for CourseAPI.
CustomField.label: Summary
